summary.span: 包含用于代表多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 标头的类型。

span.span: Contains types that are used to represent Multipurpose Internet Mail Exchange (MIME) headers.

summary.span: 使用 类发送电子邮件时，这些类型将与 命名空间中的类型一起使用，以指定 Content-Type、Content-Disposition 和 Content-transfer-Encoding 标头。

span.span: These types are used with the types in the namespace to specify Content-Type, Content-Disposition, and Content-transfer-Encoding headers when using the class to send email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MIME 数据由 类表示。MIME data is represented by the class.
